slidesDescription1: Get the professional assistance you need when you need it with complete privacy
slidesDescription2: View all the offers from different people who can help with your request and select the best fit for you
slidesDescription3: Join us as a tutor and provide help to those who need it and generate extra income using your knowledge and skills
loginSubtitle: For your privacy, Teya doesn't require a phone number or email address to sign up to login.
signup_subtitle: For your privacy, Teya doesn't require a phone number or email address to sign up for Signup.
help_subtitle: If you are planning to provide assistance to requesters in Teya some more information will be required from you.
title: Title
subject_level_subtitle: WHAT DO YOU NEED HELP WITH?
upload_image_desc: Upload image from gallery or Camera
already_my_bid_submit_subtitle: You've already submitted a bid to this request. You can cancel your bid at any time before it gets accepted or rejected by the requester
helper_didn't_submit: The helper didn't submit the requirements
add_to_note: Any notes you would like to add?
swipe_subtitle: Swipe left to reject and right to accept bids
already_assigned_subtitle: You've already accepted a bid made to your request. You can only accept one bid at a time.
payment_answer1: To secure the bid for the help provider we require the bid payment in advance. If you cancel the request at any time you will be refunded the full amount you paid.
payment_question2: Do I get my money back if I didn't like the service?
payment_answer2: Yes, you will be refunded full amount of the bid if you were not satisfied with the help provided if the provider didn't meet the requirements.
payment_question3: Do I have to do anything to request the refund?
payment_answer3: No, we will be notified immediately after cancelling the request and we will process the fund automatically.
email_not_validate_format: The email has not validated the format

openSettings: Open Settings to change the permission?
upload_pic_permission: Please Give me permission to access your photos and camera
